document_data.name: Bentley Mirrorshade
document_data.mainbody: '''Bentley Mirrorshade''' was an industrious [[gnome]] [[illusionist]] who ran the [[Friendly Arm Inn]].
document_data.Description: Bentley had curly hair and a very large nose.
document_data.Personality: Always clever and alert, Bentley had a habit of humming when in deep thought and scratching his very large nose when concerned.
document_data.Possessions: Bentley was never short of money
document_data.History: In [[1346 DR]], Bentley abandoned his life as an adventurer to run the Friendly Arm Inn after he and his comrades cleared it out.
